Player History
Injured on 7/11/1965 with a Stress Fractured Ulna, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/1967 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by California in 1968...
Injured on 7/23/1971 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 6/22/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1975, winning 2 games with a 2.12 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/1/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $2,784,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/17/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $4,125,000 per year...
